description.p: You manifest the primal weapons of your ancestry. You gain the following natural weapons:

ul.li: Claws: You can use your claws to make unarmed strikes. On a hit, they deal 1d4 + your Strength modifier slashing damage.
Bite: Your bite is a natural weapon that deals 1d4 + your Strength modifier piercing damage.

sheet.description: Gain claws (1d4 + STR slashing) and bite (1d4 + STR piercing) as natural weapons.

description.p: Your voice resonates with arcane undertones. You gain the following innate spellcasting traits:

ul.li: At 1st level, you can cast Charm Person once per long rest.
At 3rd level, you can cast Fog Cloud once per long rest.
At 5th level, you can cast Enthrall once per long rest.

description.p: Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

sheet.description: Innate spellcasting: Charm Person (1/LR, L1+), Fog Cloud (1/LR, L3+), Enthrall (1/LR, L5+), CHA-based.

description.p: Your bite becomes a deadly weapon infused with magic. It deals 1d8 necrotic damage. Once per turn, when you hit a creature with your bite, you may regain 1d4 hit points. This healing increases as you level:
You may use this healing a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.

sheet.description: Bite (1d8 necrotic). Heal 1d4 on hit once per turn, PB/LR. Heals increase at higher levels.

element.name: Song of Drowning
element.description: At level 5, while in amphibious form, target 1 creature within 30 ft that hears you. It must make a WIS save (DC 8 + PB + CHA) or be charmed and restrained until your next turn. 1/short rest. 2 targets at level 10.

sheet.description: Charm & restrain 1 (or 2 at L10) creatures with voice. WIS save (DC = 8 + PB + CHA). 1/SR.

element.name: Blood-Drinker's Grace
element.description: At level 7, gain advantage on two death saves per long rest. When you reduce a creature to 0 HP with a natural weapon, gain temp HP = CHA mod + Â½ level (1/short rest).

sheet.description: ADV on 2 death saves (1/LR). Gain temp HP when killing with natural weapon (1/SR).

element.name: Chorus of the Deep
element.description: At level 11, emit a scream in 15 ft. All chosen targets make a CON save (DC = 8 + PB + CHA). Fail: 3d8 thunder & deafened 1 turn. Success: half damage. 1/LR (2/LR at L15).

sheet.description: Thunder scream in 15 ft. CON save or 3d8 thunder + deafened. 1/LR (2/LR at L15).
